marklogic.body: I don't recall that far back but when the doctor first put me on Ambien I was wowed! My husband falls asleep within seconds of getting in bed. I had NEVER had a similar experience. Ambien showed me that it was possible to get in bed and go to sleep. I gave up on trying to quit taking it. I'll cut back in other ways. I need my sleep! On the soda .... I'm still good! I would like a Coke Zero but I wouldn't stop at one! I'm drinking water. Lots and lots of water! And the Headache is gone. So ... Sunday I will be putting the kabosh on sugar! Wish me well! My recent post Easter Basket
